fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE} Confirm route.
{PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} Push repeatedly to
{CHOICE}{CHOICE} raise body temperature.
createLineTrigger({x1:185, y1:29, z1:3, x2:205, y2:49, z2:3});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // [Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “The first time my friend Yamski and I
tried to climb the cliff was 30 years ago.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “There's an old legend that says something
fell from the sky here a long time ago.”{PAUSE}“It's supposed to have pushed the
land up and formed this cliff.”{PAUSE}“20 Years ago, Yamski and I braved this cliff
to see what was on the other side.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “But, we weren't prepared for it.
We never dreamed the temperature
would be so low…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “That cliff has a biting cold wind
that lowers your body temperature.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // “Yamski was below me.
He cut his own rope…”{PAUSE}“…I didn't even notice…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // “First, check your route…
It's hard to find
because of all the snow.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // “Second,
warm yourselves up
once you get to a ledge.”

dialogStrings:
Holzoff
“You ever hear about those who
challenged the cliff?”
{CHOICE}Yeah
{CHOICE}No

“The first time my friend Yamski and I
tried to climb the cliff was 30 years ago.”

“There's an old legend that says something
fell from the sky here a long time ago.”{PAUSE}“It's supposed to have pushed the
land up and formed this cliff.”{PAUSE}“20 Years ago, Yamski and I braved this cliff
to see what was on the other side.”

“But, we weren't prepared for it.
We never dreamed the temperature
would be so low…”

“That cliff has a biting cold wind
that lowers your body temperature.”

“Yamski was below me.
He cut his own rope…”{PAUSE}“…I didn't even notice…”

“I've lived here ever since…
challenging the cliff
and providing warning
and shelter to my fellow climbers.”

“If you're going to climb the cliff,
you need to take 2 precautions.”

“First, check your route…
It's hard to find
because of all the snow.”

“Second,
warm yourselves up
once you get to a ledge.”

“You must be tired coming
all the way up here…
Better get some rest before you head out.”

{PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE} Confirm route.
{PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} Push repeatedly to
{CHOICE}{CHOICE} raise body temperature.

[Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.
